Articles.Content:
Sorry for the bump, but if I may, I'd like to suggest a small way this mod could still remain relevant.

Something I've noticed in playing with the stock clamshell fairings, and thinking back to this mod, is that the stock ones separate too, for lack of a better word, straight. If you'll notice, the stock fairings separate perfectly neatly and float away perfectly parallel to each other. Freaky. Well, real fairings don't do that! In fact, I recall, and my screenshot earlier in this thread seems to support that recollection, that the clamshell fairings from this mod had a slight spin imparted to them at separtion, and I do miss that. OCD life.

And thanks.
